casebody.data:
MORRIS BURG ET AL., PROSECUTORS, v. BOARD OF ADJUSTMENT OF THE CITY OF PASSAIC ET AL., RESPONDENTS. Submitted May term, 1928 Decided July 27, 1928.

Before Justices Minturn, Black and Campbell.

For the prosecutors, Andrew J. Foulds, Jr. For the respondents, Joseph J. Weinberger. Per Curiam.

The judgment and proceedings under review are affirmed and the writ of certiorari dismissed under authority of Bellofatto et al. v. Montclair, 6 N. J. Mis. R. 512.
